(row = 13, col = 1)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 13, col = 1)

Given the current state, your avatar is positioned at (row=13, col=1), which is surrounded by empty spaces and walls. The previous position is the same, indicating no movement last turn. 

To proceed strategically, I will check the nearby positions:

- Up (row=12, col=1): All walls
- Down (row=14, col=1): All walls
- Left (row=13, col=0): Wall
- Right (row=13, col=2): Empty space

There are no goodies to collect in proximity, nor any monsters in adjacent squares. The only possible action is to move right to (row=13, col=2).

Thus, I will take this action.

``` Action:3 ```
Moving right is a safe and valid action since it allows progress towards exploring the level further for goodies while avoiding all hazards.
